short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Olympia is a Facebook Messenger CRM extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Olympia is a tool that helps entrepreneurs initiate conversations with potential prospects on Facebook Messenger in an organic way. It eliminates the need to manually send friend requests and allows you to send up to 30 friend requests using targeted keywords.

When a prospect accepts your friend request, Olympia sends a welcome message automatically that includes their first name, which starts the conversation for you.

With Olympia, you can track all your Messenger conversations in one place and keep tabs on where each prospect is in your sales process. Olympia also offers Canned Responses, which allow you to save frequently used sentences, paragraphs, phrases, or images to quickly send to prospects. 

Overall, Olympia is an excellent tool for entrepreneurs looking to get high-paying clients and a steady flow of leads through Facebook.
